short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get quick access to your bookmarks and history. Save your time and increase your productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly manage your online experience with this intuitive Chrome extension that provides quick access to your hundreds of your bookmarks and browsing history. Easily add current webpages to your bookmarks with a single click and search through your history seamlessly. Whether you're revisiting favorite sites or keeping track of recent activities without adding it onto chrome top bar because it looks messed, then this extension streamlines navigation and enhances productivity, all while ensuring you have the information you need at your fingertips.
